Package org.openadaptor.core

Fundamental interfaces of openadaptor and the classes that they reference.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Component.AdminMBean  
IComponent Bean interface that adds the id string property.
IDataProcessor Implemented by classes that are capable of doing some sort of processing.
IEnrichmentProcessor Interface that represents an enrichment processor.
IEnrichmentReadConnector Interface of an IReadConnector that can be plugged-in to an IEhancementProcessor.
IMessageProcessor This is the fundamental interface in the openadaptor processing framework.
IPollingReadConnector Interface for polling read connectors.
IReadConnector This represents a class which can connect to an external resource and aquire data.
IWriteConnector Represents a class that can send / write some data to an external resource.
 

Class Summary
Component Implementation of IComponent serves as a base class for other classes in openadaptor.
Message Class that encapsulates the input data to be processed by an IMessageProcessor.
Response Class that encapsulate the output data from an IMessageProcessor.
 

Package org.openadaptor.core Description

Fundamental interfaces of openadaptor and the classes that they reference.

The IMessageProcessor interface represents something that can process a Message and return a Response, classes such as Adaptor, Node, Router and Pipeline implement this interface. The implementations of IMessageProcessor and other core interfaces to do with transaction management, exception processing and lifecycle management are all under this package.

The IReadConnector represents something that connect to an external resource and read / receive data, it can be thought of as the thing that initiates the processing.

The IWriteConnector interface represents something that can connect to an external resource and write / deliver data, it can be thought of as the thing that completes the processing.

The IDataProcessor represents something that modifies or discards data, it can be thought of as an intermediate step in the processing.

The implementations of these interfaces are mainly found in the following packages.

  • org.openadaptor.auxil
  • org.openadaptor.thirdparty
